name: cameruptite
effect: Held: Allows Camerupt to Mega Evolve into Mega Camerupt.
short_effect: Held: Allows Camerupt to Mega Evolve into Mega Camerupt.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Camerupt hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
